# Summary
Briefly explain what this PR does and why.

## Changes
- Bullet the main changes (code/tests/docs)

## How to run tests locally
- Node/React: `npm test` (from the task folder)
- Python: `pytest -q` or `python -m unittest`
- C++: build & run the test command from README

## Checklist
- [ ] Tests pass locally
- [ ] README/docs updated if needed
- [ ] CI is green after push
- [ ] Scope is small and reviewable
